neighbors.name: Bouchikas Family Revocable Lifetime Trust
neighbors.claims: The Bouchikas Family Revocable Lifetime Trust is the recorded owner of property in Cochise County, specifically a 3.99-acre parcel with a mobile/manufactured home ([loopnet.com](https://www.loopnet.com/property/2098-n-cougar-pl-douglas-az-85607/04003-10606026C/)). Family members associated with the name in the region include Chris Bouchikas, a farrier based in Elgin/Huachuca City who serves the southern Arizona equine community ([americanfarriers.com](https://www.americanfarriers.com/articles/10308-farriers-week-farriers-spotlight?page=3)). No corporate filings, political contributions, or public statements regarding development were found for the trust.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local resident family with professional ties to the equine community (farrier work); no evidence of broad political or economic influence.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the family informally, acknowledging their local roots and equine interests; Chris Bouchikas is a known local professional.

citations.claim: The Bouchikas Family Revocable Lifetime Trust is the recorded owner of property in Cochise County, specifically a 3.99-acre parcel with a mobile/manufactured home
citations.title: 2098 N Cougar Pl Property Details

neighbors.name: Lisa E Stansbury Living Trust
neighbors.claims: The Lisa E. Stansbury Living Trust holds title to a residential property at 682 W Norraine Ln in Huachuca City, acquired in May 2023 ([homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/682-w-norraine-ln-huachuca-city-az/8qvmcg5vq2yx8/)). Lisa E. Stansbury is a glass artist operating 'Lisa E. Stansbury Glass Art Studio' and is listed in the Veterans In Business (VIB) Network directory ([vibnetwork.org](https://www.vibnetwork.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/VIBProgram2023R-1.pdf)). She is the widow of Douglas Stansbury, a former telecommunications executive ([echovita.com](https://www.echovita.com/us/obituaries/az/sierra-vista/douglas-stansbury-11036116)). No public statements regarding local development projects were identified.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local artist and small business owner listed in veteran business directories; likely holds limited influence primarily within personal and veteran business networks.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Lisa E. Stansbury with respect for her artistic business and veteran connections; inquiry should be personal and community-oriented.
